mapper.sql: id, `key`, prefix, status, x, y, w, h, gmt_create as gmtCreate, gmt_modified as gmtModified, delete_mark as deleteMark
mapper.insert: insert into cut_data(`key`, prefix, status, x, y, w, h,gmt_create, gmt_modified, delete_mark) VALUES (#{key}, #{prefix}, #{status}, #{x}, #{y}, #{w}, #{h}, now(), now(), #{deleteMark}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status = #{status}, x = #{x}, y = #{y}, w = #{w}, h = #{h}, gmt_modified=now(), delete_mark = #{deleteMark}

insert into cut_data(`key`, prefix, status, x, y, w, h,gmt_create, gmt_modified, delete_mark) VALUES (#{key}, #{prefix}, #{status}, #{x}, #{y}, #{w}, #{h}, now(), now(), #{deleteMark}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE gmt_modified=now()
